Subject: Technical Competencies Upskilling
--------------------------------------------------


 

Dear Hagop GHAZARIAN,

 

As part of our shared commitment to your professional growth, we’ve reviewed your 2024 Performance Review and identified a few learning opportunities to help you strengthen key technical competencies.

 

Note: See below for details on accessing your Coursera license. 

 

We encourage you to explore the following Coursera courses, available through our Learning Pathways:

 

Operations Management: Organization and Analysis: https://www.coursera.org/learn/operations-management-organization-and-analysis

Operations Management: Quality and Supply Chain: https://www.coursera.org/learn/operations-management-quality-and-supply-chain

 

 

You’re also welcome to browse other relevant courses and competencies here:



     Administrative Learning Pathways:  Administrative Job Family <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3026> 

 

If you don’t yet have a Coursera license, you can request one here: Coursera License <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=619>  

Or simply scan the QR code below to receive your Coursera license

If you don’t yet have a Coursera license, you can request one here: Coursera License <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=619>  

Or simply scan the QR code below to receive your Coursera license

 



 

We’re here to support you on your learning journey. If you have any questions, need guidance in selecting courses, or would like to discuss your development goals, please feel free to connect with us anytime.

 

With you at heart, 

Chalhoub University
